enableImperialUnitSystem.name: enableImperialUnitSystem
enableImperialUnitSystem.prettyName: Enable imperial unit system for entering measurements

livetableColumns.name: livetableColumns

livetableRows.name: livetableRows
livetableRows.prettyName: Number of rows to display by default

measurementUnitSystem.name: measurementUnitSystem
measurementUnitSystem.prettyName: Default unit system for entering measurements, when "Imperial unit system" is enabled

phenotypeMapping.name: phenotypeMapping
phenotypeMapping.sql: select doc.fullName, doc.name from XWikiDocument doc, BaseObject obj where doc.fullName <> 'PhenoTips.PhenotypeMappingTemplate' and obj.name = doc.fullName and obj.className = 'PhenoTips.PhenotypeMappingClass'

property.codeToExecute:
#set($targetDocName = 'data.WebHome') #set($targetDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($targetDocName)) #set($className = 'XWiki.GadgetClass') #set($gadgetObj = $targetDoc.getObject($className)) #set($prefix = "${className}_${gadgetObj.number}_") #set($fullPrefix = "${targetDocName}_${prefix}") {{html clean=false}}

{{/html}}

{{info}}The phenotype categories and phenotypes that are displayed by default in the patient form, on the in the left side of the "Clinical symptoms & physical findings" section, are defined in a separate configuration document. Choose the configuration document to use from the options listed below. A preview of the selected configuration will be displayed on the right.{{/info}} #if ($isAdvancedUser) #set ($errorMessage = '') #if ($request.doCreate == '1' && $services.csrf.isTokenValid($request.form_token)) #if ("$!{request.name.trim()}" == '') #set ($errorMessage = 'Please enter a phenotype configuration name') #else #set ($targetDocument = $services.model.createDocumentReference($xcontext.database, $request.space, $request.name.trim())) #if ($xwiki.exists($targetDocument)) #set ($errorMessage = "A document named //${request.name}// already exists. Please choose a different name") #else $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($targetDocument, 'edit', "editor=inline&template=$escapetool.url($!{request.classTemplate})&title=$!escapetool.url($request.name)&parent=$!escapetool.url($request.parent)")) #break #end #end #end #if ("$!errorMessage" != '') {{error}}$errorMessage{{/error}} #end {{html clean=false}}
{{/html}} #end (% class="mappingPreviewContainer side" %)((( (% class="hint side" %)(((Preview))) (% id="mappingPreview"%)((())) ))) $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.YesNoNAPicker', {'colorTheme' : "$!{themeDocFullName}"})## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets', {'colorTheme' : "$!{themeDocFullName}"})## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.PatientSheetCode', {'colorTheme' : "$!{themeDocFullName}"})## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.PhenotypeMappingPreview', {'colorTheme' : "$!{themeDocFullName}"})## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.PhenotypeMappingPreview')##

property.content: {{velocity}} #if ($isGuest) #set ($availableData = $services.query.hql(", BaseObject pat where pat.name = doc.fullName and doc.fullName <> 'PhenoTips.PatientTemplate' and pat.className = 'PhenoTips.PatientClass' and doc.creator = 'XWiki.XWikiGuest' and not exists (from BaseObject accessObj where accessObj.name = doc.fullName and accessObj.className = 'PhenoTips.OwnerClass')").count()) #else #set ($availableData = $services.query.hql(", BaseObject pat where pat.name = doc.fullName and doc.fullName <> 'PhenoTips.PatientTemplate' and pat.className = 'PhenoTips.PatientClass' and (doc.creator in (:o, :os) and (not exists (from BaseObject own where own.className = 'PhenoTips.OwnerClass' and own.name = doc.fullName)) or exists (from BaseObject own, StringProperty owner where own.className = 'PhenoTips.OwnerClass' and own.name = doc.fullName and owner.id.id = own.id and owner.value = :o))").bindValue('o', $xcontext.userReference.toString()).bindValue('os', $services.model.serialize($xcontext.userReference, 'compactwiki')).count()) #end #if ($availableData > 0) $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/suggest/suggestPicker.css', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/suggest/suggestPicker.js', true)## $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/userpicker/userPicker.css', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/userpicker/userPicker.js', true)## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.DatabaseFilters')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.Skin', {'colorTheme' : "$xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')"})## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.DBWebHomeSheet')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.DBWebHomeSheet')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## $xwiki.jsx.use('XWiki.DateTimePicker')## $xwiki.ssx.use('XWiki.DateTimePicker')## #set ($config = $xwiki.getDocument('data.WebHome').getObject('PhenoTips.DBConfigurationClass')) #set ($patientClassName = 'PhenoTips.PatientClass') #if ($config) #set ($columns = ['external_id', 'doc.creator', 'doc.creationDate', '_actions']) #set ($columnsProperties = { '_actions' : {'actions': ['edit', 'delete']} }) #foreach ($column in $columns) #set ($isFilterable = ($column == 'external_id')) #set ($discard = $columnsProperties.put($column, { 'type' : 'text', 'link' : 'view', 'size' : 7, 'filterable' : $isFilterable, 'sortable': true, 'html': true })) #end ## ## #set ($options = { 'className' : $patientClassName, 'translationPrefix' : 'patient.livetable.', 'rowCount' : 25, 'maxPages' : 10, 'selectedColumn' : $config.getProperty('livetableSortColumn').value, 'defaultOrder' : 'asc', 'resultPage' : 'PhenoTips.LiveTableResults' }) #if ($isGuest) #set ($filterWhere = "and doc.creator = 'XWiki.XWikiGuest' and not exists (from BaseObject accessObj where accessObj.name = doc.fullName and accessObj.className = 'PhenoTips.OwnerClass')") #else #set ($o = $services.model.serialize($xcontext.userReference, 'default')) #set ($os = $services.model.serialize($xcontext.userReference, 'compactwiki')) #set ($filterWhere = "and (doc.creator in ('${o}', '${os}') and (not exists (from BaseObject own where own.className = 'PhenoTips.OwnerClass' and own.name = doc.fullName)) or exists (from BaseObject own, StringProperty owner where own.className = 'PhenoTips.OwnerClass' and own.name = doc.fullName and owner.id.id = own.id and owner.value = '${o}'))") #end #set ($discard = $options.put('extraParams', "&filterWhere=${escapetool.url($filterWhere)}")) ###if ("$!config.getProperty('livetableRows').value" != '' && $config.getProperty('livetableRows').value > 0) ## #set ($options.rowCount = $config.getProperty('livetableRows').value) ###end #set ($options.rowCount = 25) #livetable('mypatients' $columns $columnsProperties $options) $xwiki.ssfx.use('js/xwiki/table/livetable.css', {'colorTheme' : "$xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')", 'forceSkinAction' : true})## #else {{warning}}**Configuration missing.**{{/warning}} #end #else {{info}}You are not the owner of any data.{{/info}} #end {{/velocity}}

property.title: Patient records created by me#if ($hasCreatePage) {{html clean=false}}{{/html}}#end

property.content: {{velocity}} #if ($isGuest) {{info}}Unauthenticated users cannot validate patient records{{/info}} #else #set ($availableData = $services.query.hql(", BaseObject pat, BaseObject val, LargeStringProperty valUser, IntegerProperty validated where pat.name = doc.fullName and doc.fullName <> 'PhenoTips.PatientTemplate' and pat.className = 'PhenoTips.PatientClass' and val.name = doc.fullName and val.className = 'PhenoTips.PatientRecordValidationClass' and valUser.id.id = val.id and valUser.id.name = 'user' and valUser.value = :o and validated.id.id = val.id and validated.id.name = 'validated' and validated.value <> 1").bindValue('o', $xcontext.userReference.toString()).count()) #if ($availableData > 0) $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/suggest/suggestPicker.css', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/suggest/suggestPicker.js', true)## $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/userpicker/userPicker.css', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/userpicker/userPicker.js', true)## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.DatabaseFilters')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.Skin', {'colorTheme' : "$xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')"})## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.DBWebHomeSheet')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.DBWebHomeSheet')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## $xwiki.jsx.use('XWiki.DateTimePicker')## $xwiki.ssx.use('XWiki.DateTimePicker')## #set ($config = $xwiki.getDocument('data.WebHome').getObject('PhenoTips.DBConfigurationClass')) #set ($patientClassName = 'PhenoTips.PatientClass') #if ($config) #set ($columns = ['external_id', 'doc.creator', 'doc.creationDate', '_actions']) #set ($columnsProperties = { '_actions' : {'actions': ['edit', 'delete']} }) #foreach ($column in $columns) #set ($isFilterable = ($column == 'external_id')) #set ($discard = $columnsProperties.put($column, { 'type' : 'text', 'link' : 'view', 'size' : 7, 'filterable' : $isFilterable, 'sortable': true, 'html': true })) #end ## ## #set ($options = { 'className' : $patientClassName, 'translationPrefix' : 'patient.livetable.', 'rowCount' : 25, 'maxPages' : 10, 'selectedColumn' : $config.getProperty('livetableSortColumn').value, 'defaultOrder' : 'asc', 'resultPage' : 'PhenoTips.LiveTableResults' }) #set ($o = $services.model.serialize($xcontext.userReference, 'default')) #set ($filterFrom = ', BaseObject val, LargeStringProperty valUser, IntegerProperty validated') #set ($filterWhere = "and val.name = doc.fullName and val.className = 'PhenoTips.PatientRecordValidationClass' and valUser.id.id = val.id and valUser.id.name = 'user' and valUser.value = '${o}' and validated.id.id = val.id and validated.id.name = 'validated' and validated.value <> 1))") #set ($discard = $options.put('extraParams', "&filterWhere=${escapetool.url($filterWhere)}&filterFrom=${escapetool.url($filterFrom)}")) ###if ("$!config.getProperty('livetableRows').value" != '' && $config.getProperty('livetableRows').value > 0) ## #set ($options.rowCount = $config.getProperty('livetableRows').value) ###end #set ($options.rowCount = 25) #livetable('validatingpatients' $columns $columnsProperties $options) $xwiki.ssfx.use('js/xwiki/table/livetable.css', {'colorTheme' : "$xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')", 'forceSkinAction' : true})## #else {{warning}}**Configuration missing.**{{/warning}} #end #else {{info}}No records to validate.{{/info}} #end #end## isguest {{/velocity}}

{{velocity}} #set ($query = ", BaseObject patientObj where patientObj.name = doc.fullName and doc.fullName <> 'PhenoTips.PatientTemplate' and patientObj.className = 'PhenoTips.PatientClass'") #set ($availableData = $services.query.hql($query).count()) #if ($availableData > 0) $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/suggest/suggestPicker.css', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/suggest/suggestPicker.js', true)## $xwiki.ssfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/userpicker/userPicker.css', true)## $xwiki.jsfx.use('uicomponents/widgets/userpicker/userPicker.js', true)## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.DatabaseFilters')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.Skin', {'colorTheme' : "$xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')"})## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.DBWebHomeSheet')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.DBWebHomeSheet')## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## $xwiki.jsx.use('XWiki.DateTimePicker')## $xwiki.ssx.use('XWiki.DateTimePicker')## #set ($config = $xwiki.getDocument('data.WebHome').getObject('PhenoTips.DBConfigurationClass')) #set ($patientClassName = 'PhenoTips.PatientClass') #if ($config) #set ($columns = ['external_id', 'doc.creator', 'doc.creationDate', '_actions']) #set ($columnsProperties = { '_actions' : {'actions': ['edit', 'delete']} }) #foreach ($column in $columns) #set ($isFilterable = ($column == 'external_id')) #set ($discard = $columnsProperties.put($column, { 'type' : 'text', 'link' : 'view', 'size' : 7, 'filterable' : $isFilterable, 'sortable': true, 'html': true })) #end ## ## #set ($options = { 'className' : $patientClassName, 'translationPrefix' : 'patient.livetable.', 'rowCount' : 25, 'maxPages' : 10, 'selectedColumn' : $config.getProperty('livetableSortColumn').value, 'defaultOrder' : 'asc', 'resultPage' : 'PhenoTips.LiveTableResults' }) #set ($options.rowCount = 50) #livetable('sharedpatients' $columns $columnsProperties $options) $xwiki.ssfx.use('js/xwiki/table/livetable.css', {'colorTheme' : "$xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')", 'forceSkinAction' : true})## #else {{warning}}**Configuration missing.**{{/warning}} #end #else {{info}}No patient records available yet.{{/info}} #end {{/velocity}}

property.title: All available records (% style="float: right;" %)[[Browse all data »>>data.AllData]]

property.content:
{{velocity}}{{html clean=false}} $xwiki.linkx.use('//netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.1.0/css/font-awesome.css', {'rel': 'stylesheet'})## $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.FontAwesomeIcons')##
$services.localization.render('core.menu.main.title')
#set ($workspaceManagerMainDocumentReference = $services.model.createDocumentReference($xcontext.mainWikiName, 'WorkspaceManager', 'WebHome')) #set ($isWorkspaceManagerAppInstalled = $xwiki.exists($workspaceManagerMainDocumentReference)) #set ($isWorkspace = $services.workspace.isWorkspace($xcontext.database)) #set ($isMainWikiUser = ($xcontext.mainWikiName == "$!{xcontext.userReference.wikiReference.name}")) ## ## User ## #if (!$xcontext.action.startsWith('login')) #if ($isGuest) #set ($loginurl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiLogin', 'login', "xredirect=$escapetool.url($xwiki.relativeRequestURL)")) #xwikitopmenuentry($!loginurl $!services.localization.render('login') 'tmLogin' 'fa fa-sign-in') #else #set ($logouturl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.XWikiLogout', 'logout', "xredirect=$escapetool.url($xwiki.relativeRequestURL)")) #xwikitopmenuentry($!logouturl $!services.localization.render('logout') 'tmLogout' 'fa fa-sign-out') #end #end #if ($isGuest && $xwiki.hasAccessLevel('register', 'XWiki.XWikiPreferences')) #set ($regurl = $xwiki.getURL('XWiki.Register', 'register')) #xwikitopmenuentry($!regurl $!services.localization.render('core.register') 'tmRegister' 'fa fa-plus-square') #end ## ## #if (!$isGuest) #if ($isSuperAdmin) #xwikitopmenuentry('#' $!services.localization.render('superadmin') 'tmUser' 'fa fa-user') #else #xwikitopmenuentry("$!xwiki.getURL($xcontext.user)" "$!xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.user, false)" 'tmUser' 'fa fa-user') #end #end
## ## Administration ## #set ($isAdminAppInstalled = $xwiki.exists('XWiki.AdminSheet')) #if ($isAdminAppInstalled && $hasSpaceAdmin) #set ($adminspaceaction = $!xwiki.getURL("XWiki.XWikiPreferences", 'admin')) #xwikitopmenuentry($adminspaceaction 'Administration' 'tmAdminSpace' 'fa fa-cogs') #end
{{/html}}{{/velocity}}
